User Manual for PMKSY MIS (OI)

Project Execution By:
Rainfed Farming System (RFS) Division

Ministry of Agriculture & Farmers Welfare

National Informatics Centre Ministry of Electronics & Information Technology Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana Other Interventions

Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana Other Interventions

User Manual of PMKSY-Other Interventions| RFS Division Log-in the Application

Step 1st: Login as a “State/District User”.
(i)
Enter Login/Email ID in “Login ID” Textbox.
(ii)
Enter Password in “Password” Textbox.
(iii)
Enter code shown in image in “Enter below code” Textbox.
(iv)
Click on “Login” button.

(After Login)

Enter Lo

shown in image in “Enter below code” Textbox.
(iv)
Click on “Login” button.

(After Login)

Enter Login/Email ID Enter Password (Case Sensitive)
Enter below Image code Click Login

Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana Other Interventions

User Manual of PMKSY-Other Interventions| RFS Division Create Nodal State User

Step 2nd: Click on “User” menu.
(i)
Click on “Create User” Sub-Menu.

(After Click on “Create User”)

Click Here

Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana Other Interventions

User Manual of PMKSY-Other Interventions| RFS Division New User Registration (Create State Nodal User)

(Select Level as State for State level user & select District for District Level User)

Select Level as State/District

User Manual of PMKSY-

as State/District

Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana Other Interventions

User Manual of PMKSY-Other Interventions| RFS Division (After Select as “State”)
Step 3rd: Create User for State (Nodal Officer).
(i)
Select Level “State” on Level Dropdown box.
(ii)
Fill all mandatory fields In User Registration form.
(iii)
To Create State User as Nodal State User then select the “Is Nodal User” Checkbox.
(iv)
Click on Submit Button (State User Created as Nodal Officer).

Click here

Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana Other Interventions

User Manual of PMKSY-Other Interventions| RFS Division (Create User as a “Nodal State officer”)

Enter User Name Enter Date of Birth Select Designation Enter Contact Number Enter Email as Login Create Password (Must contain one Upper Alphabet, one Small Al

r Contact Number Enter Email as Login Create Password (Must contain one Upper Alphabet, one Small Alphabet, one special symbol, one number and minimum of 8 character If “Create As Nodal State User” Then Select Checkbox

Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana Other Interventions

User Manual of PMKSY-Other Interventions| RFS Division Note: (I) Nodal State User has Permission to create State Nodal Users, State Users & District Nodal Users and District users.
(ii) Email used will be your Login ID.
(iii) State, Ministry and Department Textbox are auto filled.

Click on Submit (User created as state nodal officer)

Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana Other Interventions

User Manual of PMKSY-Other Interventions| RFS Division Create State User

Step 4th: Create User As a State User (Without N

ther Interventions| RFS Division Create State User

Step 4th: Create User As a State User (Without Nodal User Permission).
(i)
Select Level “State” on Level Dropdown list.
(ii)
Fill All Mandatory Fields In User Registration Form.
(iii)
To Create State User without permission of Nodal State User then Uncheck/Blank the “Is Nodal User” Checkbox.
(iv)
Click on Submit Button (State User Created Without Permission of Nodal Officer).
Note: (i) State Admin User have No Permission to create District Users.
(ii) Email used will be your Login ID.
(iii) State, Ministry and Department textbox are auto filled.

If Create State User (Without Nodal User) then Uncheck the Checkbox Click on Submit (User Created As State User without Nodal User Permission)
Click Here

Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana O

ed As State User without Nodal User Permission)
Click Here

Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana Other Interventions

User Manual of PMKSY-Other Interventions| RFS Division Create District User

Step 5th: Create User as District Users.
(i)
Login as a Nodal State User.
(ii)
Click on “Create User” tab.
(iii)
Select “District” in Level Dropdown list.
(iv)
Fill all mandatory Fields in User Registration Form.
(v)
Click on Submit (District User Created).

Note: (i) Only Nodal State User have permission to create District user.
(ii) State, Ministry and Department textbox are auto filled.

Click Here Select District

Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana Other Interventions

User Manual of PMKSY-Other Interventions| RFS Division Select District Enter Name Enter Date of Select Designation Enter

Other Interventions| RFS Division Select District Enter Name Enter Date of Select Designation Enter Number Enter Email (Taken as Create Password Enter Password Same as Password Textbox Click on Submit (District User Created)

Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana Other Interventions

User Manual of PMKSY-Other Interventions| RFS Division New User – Reset Password

Note: Whenever Both State and District User Login for First Time over Website, Change Password.
Form Shows User must change password.

Enter Existing Password in Old Password (Case Sensitive)
Create New Password (Case Sensitive)
Enter Password Same as New Password (Case Sensitive)
Click on Submit (Change Password)
